message.content:
Some activities you can do with a group of people at night include:

1. Stargazing - Head to a spot with minimal light pollution and watch the stars together, using an app or book to help identify constellations.

2. Outdoor movie night - Set up a projector and screen in your backyard (or use a white sheet) and enjoy watching movies under the stars.

3. Game night - Gather around for board games, card games, or party games like charades.

4. Bonfire/s'mores party - Build a fire outside and roast marshmallows for s'mores while sharing stories or playing music.

5. Themed dinner party/cultural food potluck - Decorate according to the theme, prepare dishes from different cultures, and dress in accordance with the chosen place or era.

6. Ghost tour/walking tour - Explore your area's haunted history by going on a guided ghost tour or make it more personal by researching local legends.

7. Trivia/quiz night – Host your trivia game where teams compete against one another answering themed questions on various topics such as pop culture, history, current events etcetera

8.Crafting/DIY workshop – Arrange workshops where interested participants can create art masterpieces collaboratively ranging from painting sessions to DIY-garden decor parties 

9.Karaoke/Band Jam Session – Join voices harmoniously celebrating collective love for music either through singing karaoke songs; alternatively gather instruments together jamming creatively as an impromptu band
10.Escape room adventure/board overnight stay: Seek out establishments providing late-night escape room experiences working synergistically solving brain-challenging puzzles completing corresponding objectives marked within limited time-frames

Regardless of what activity you choose– just remember respecting everyone’s preferences
